titleStmt.title: An essay for advancement of husbandry-learning, or, Propositions for the er recting [sic] colledge of husbandry and in order thereunto for the taking in of pupills or apprentices, and also friends or fellowes of the same colledge or society.
titleStmt.author: Hartlib, Samuel, d. 1662.
Dymock, Cressy.

notesStmt.note: Written by Cressy Dymock? Cf. Dircks, Biographical memoir of Samuel Hartlib, 1865.
Reproduction of original in the Goldsmiths Library, University of London.
